title: Ordered algebra
summary: In mathematics, an ordered algebra is an algebra over the real numbers R {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} } with unit e together with an associated order such that e is positive (i.e. e â‰¥ 0), the product of any two positive elements is again positive, and when A is considered as a vector space over R {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} } then it is an Archimedean ordered vector space.
